abstract: Boat accident off coast of Turkey kills 37 people, including 10 children, believed to be Syrian refugees; experts say January 2016 alone has seen 218 people drown in Aegean Sea trying to reach Greece.

headline.print_headline: 10 Children Among the Dead as a Migrant Boat Capsizes Off Turkey
headline.main: 10 Children Among the Dead as a Migrant Boat Capsizes Off Turkey

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Coast guard officials said at least 33 people had died, and 75 were rescued. But officials suspect more migrants were trapped inside the boat and that the death toll will rise.
lead_paragraph: Coast guard officials said at least 33 people had died, and 75 were rescued. But officials suspect more migrants were trapped inside the boat and that the death toll will rise.
